university_name: ONDO STATE UNIVERSITY OF MEDICAL SCIENCES LAJE ROAD ONDO ONDO STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
Have passed WAEC or NECO with minimum of 5 credits including English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics in one sitting, prospective candidates must have acquired any one of the following:

i. A minimum of grade C pass at Higher School Certificate advanced level or its equivalent in Biology, Chemistry and Physics in not more than one sitting.

ii. A minimum of second class degree in any of the basic sciences or basic medical sciences from University of Medical Sciences or any recognized University.

iii. Be a holder of a diploma (upper credit) from Medical Rehabilitation Therapists Board accredited programmes.
utme_requirements: Credits in Chemistry, Physics, Biology, English Language and Mathematics in the West African School Certificate Examination (WASCE) or National Examination Council (NECO) provided that all subjects are taken and passed in one sitting.
subjects: English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Biology.

university_name: BAUCHI STATE UNIVERSITY GADAU BAUCHI STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
a) Two (2) ‘A’ level passes at the IJMB examination or the equivalent with SSCE O level credit passes in English, mathematics and any three Arts and social science subjects.

b) NCE/ND/ HND in any Arts or Social Science related courses with at least a merit pass or the equivalent with SSCE O level credit passes in English, mathematics and any three in Arts or Social Science subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes which must include English Language, Mathematics, and any three (3) Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: English Language, Mathematic and any three Arts or Social Science Subjects

Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two (2) other subjects.

For NBC holders, the other two (2) relevant subjects could be from any of Principles of Accounts, Commerce, Office Practice and Secretarial Duties.?
subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus any Social Science subject.

direct_entry_requirements:
A pass at merit level in Agriculture or related subjects provided the SSCE requirements are met.

Advanced level passes in 2 of Biology, Agricultural Science and chemistry.  The SSCE, equivalent requirements must be met.

NCE with at an overall pass at merit level in Agricultural Science as a double major or in combination with relevant subject.

IJMB passes in 2 of Biology, Agricultural Science and Chemistry with the SSCE requirements satisfied

Any other equivalent qualifications  

In addition to the general requirements for graduation at the University, students of Agricultural Education must offer and pass courses totaling 150 credit hours for the five years programme or 120 credit hours in case of four years programme.  They must also complete and receive a pass grade in Teaching Practical and a research project report on a topic approved by the Department.
utme_requirements: Five credit passes in SSCE or equivalent in Biology/ Agricultural Science, chemistry, economics, physics, English language and mathematics.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Chemistry, Biology, Agriculture, Physics, Economics, Geography and Mathematics.

university_name: KWARA STATE UNIVERSITY MALETE ILORIN KWARA STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
Any one of the following qualifications is admissible for the four (4) year degree programmes of universities in education:

a)     A pass at merit level in a relevant Diploma Programme (provided the University English requirement has been satisfied).

b)    Two (2) passes in relevant subject areas at advanced level with SC/GCE    ‘O’ Level credit passes in five other subjects at not more than two (2)           sittings or

c)     Three (3) passes in relevant subject areas at advanced level with SC/GCE    ‘O’ Level credit passes in five other subjects in not more than two (2)           sittings.

d)    Passes in two (2) major subjects in relevant areas in the NCE with GCE          ‘O’ Level credit or its equivalent in five (5) other subjects.  A’ Level             subject for those taking courses in Education.

e)     Two (2) passes at the IJMB (interim Joint Matriculation Board)       examination or Cambridge Moderated Schools of Basic Studies Terminal Examinations in International Baccalaureate from a recognized institution       with School Certificate Credits or equivalent in five other subjects (subject to university requirements).

f)     Five passes in C (ii) above with a School Certificate credit or its       equivalent in other subjects. 

g)    The above qualification in C (i) should apply to students in colleges of Education to qualify for admission in the B.Ed degree programme.
utme_requirements: Credit passes in the Senior Secondary School (S.S.S.) Certificate, or its equivalent in relevant subject areas in addition to acceptable pass in the Joint Matriculation Examination, are the qualifications for admission into the five (5) year degree programmes of Universities in education.
subjects: Two (2) Arts subject including Religious studies and one (1) other subject.

university_name: KWARA STATE UNIVERSITY MALETE ILORIN KWARA STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
Direct Entry Admission is to either the 200 Level or 300 Level depending on the qualification of the candidate.

i) For admission into 200 Level, the candidate must satisfy the following requirements:

a)  Obtain Ordinary Level (O’Level) passes at least at credit level in not more than two sittings in at least five subjects including English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and either Agricultural Science or Biology.

b) At least two Advanced Level passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

OR

c) National Diploma (ND) with a minimum of Upper Credit (minimum) from a recognized Institution with one year Industrial Attachment Certificate.

ii) For admission to 300 Level, the candidate must satisfy the following requirements:

a) Obtain Ordinary Level (O’ Level) passes at least at credit level in not more than two sittings in at least five subjects including English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and either Agricultural Science or Biology.

b) Obtain Higher National Diploma (HND) with a minimum of Upper Credit from a recognized Institution.
utme_requirements:
This category of admission is to 100 Level and to be qualified, the candidate must satisfy the following conditions:

i) Pass in the University Matriculation Examination (UME) conducted by the Joint Admission and Matriculation Board (JAMB) in English Language, Mathematics; Chemistry and Physics.

ii) Obtain Ordinary Level (O’Level) passes at least at credit level at not more than two sittings in at least five subjects including English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and either Agricultural Science or Biology.
subjects: Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics.

ii) Holders of the Ordinary National Diploma (OND) in Surveying and related field from a NBTE accredited Institution.

(ii) NCE with passes at Merit level in relevant subjects.
(iii) ND/HND at Credit level in a related discipline
(iv) A good pass in JUPEB/IJMB with 5 points and above without an “F” grade will be admitted to 200 level.

(vi) A University degree in a related discipline.

utme_requirements: Five credit passes at SSCE/NECO/GCE O' Level which should include English Language, Mathematics, Biology/Health Science, one social science and any other subject
subjects: English Language, Mathematics and any other two subjects

university_name: DELTA STATE UNIVERSITY ABRAKA DELTA STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
(i) Two (2) A/L passes in CRS and one other Arts or Social Sciences subject with minimum of 9 points

(ii) Merit Pass in NCE, one of the subject must be Religious Studies

(iii) Merit Pass in DELSU Diploma in Law, Social Studies Education, or Guidance and Counselling
utme_requirements: 5 O/L (WAEC or NECO) Credit Passes including English Language, CRS and Mathematics and any other two subjects. A pass in Mathematics is acceptable but students must have five (5) credit passes with English Language and CRS.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies (CRS, English Language and any other two subjects)

university_name: DELTA STATE UNIVERSITY ABRAKA DELTA STATE
direct_entry_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) from Biology, Zoology or Botany.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and either Physics or Mathematics.

university_name: DELTA STATE UNIVERSITY ABRAKA DELTA STATE

utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Government or History, English Language and three (3) other subjects.  A pass in Mathematics is required.
subjects: Three (3) Social Science or Arts subjects.

university_name: DELTA STATE UNIVERSITY ABRAKA DELTA STATE

university_name: DELTA STATE UNIVERSITY ABRAKA DELTA STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.

(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.

university_name: DELTA STATE UNIVERSITY ABRAKA DELTA STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
(i) NCE (Technical) with an overall merit or above.

(ii) Full Technological Certificate or National Diploma (ND) or HND or Advanced Technological Certificate (ANTC).

(iii) GCE Advanced Level/HSC in two of the following subjects: Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics plus three credits in WASC/SSE/GCE O/L including English Language and Mathematics
utme_requirements:
(i) GCE O/L, WASC or SSC or its equivalent pass with credits in five subjects in Mathematics, English Language, Physics or Chemistry and any other Arts/Social Science/Science subjects.
(ii) City and Guilds Intermediate in addition to three credits pass in WASC/GCE/NECO/NTC ordinary level in Mathematics, English Language, Physics or Chemistry and any other Arts/Social Science/Science subjects.
subjects:
(i) English Language

(ii) Mathematics

(iii) Physics or Chemistry

(v) Any other Science or Social Science subjects

university_name: DELTA STATE UNIVERSITY ABRAKA DELTA STATE
direct_entry_requirements: NCE Merit in Theatre Arts and other related Arts in addition to the required Five (5) credits SSCE, GCE O/L, NECO, Candidates with Diploma (Upper Credit and above) in related Arts (Fine Art, Music, Mass Communication and Literature) may be admitted for the 3 years degree programme.
utme_requirements: The University general admission requirements is five (5) credits at SSCE level or its equivalent, including English and Literature, earned at not more than two sitting.
subjects: The UME subjects are Literature in English, English Language and three others from Arts/Social Science

direct_entry_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any of Biology, Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics.

 

(ii)  NCE merit in Physical Education and credit in Arithmetical process or Mathematics.

 

(iii)  Diploma in Health Education, Environmental Sanitation, Physical Education, Social work, Health Administration with overall grades of merit plus three (3) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit which should include English Language.

 

(iv) NCE in Biology, Health Education, and Integrated Science with a pass grade plus two (2) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit passes.

 

(v)    Registered Nurse plus five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language.

i) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes including     English Language, Biology or its equivalent.

 

ii) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes to include English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) relevant subjects.

university_name: TAI SOLARIN UNIVERSITY OF EDUCATION IJAGUN OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
i.) Nigeria Certificate in Education (NCE) from any accredited institution in Nigeria with credits in teaching subjects including Chemistry.

ii.)  G.C.E. A’ Level with at least credits in two (2) science subjects which one must be Chemistry.

iii) OND/HND with Lower Credit  in the following areas: Chemistry, Science Laboratory Technology, Medical Laboratory Technology, Pharmaceutical Technology from accredited institutions in Nigeria.

v. JUPEB/ IJMB.
utme_requirements:
1) A minimum of five (5) credits at one sitting in five (5) major O’ level Science subjects: English, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and Biology.

2.)  A minimum of five (5) credits at two sittings in five (5) major O’ level Science subjects: English, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics, Biology and Geography/Agricultural Science.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agric Physics, Mathematics.

university_name: IGNATIUS AJURU UNIVERSITY OF EDUCATION PORT HARCOURT RIVERS STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
Applicants with one of the following qualifications may be considered for admission by direct entry:

 

(a). A minimum of five (5) credit passed at not more than  two sittings  at credit level of  the SSCE/ GCE O/level. No of subjects shall be counted at both ordinary and advance levels.

 (b). Credits or merits in three major subject areas in the  NCE.

 (c). Two passes  at JUPEB, IJMB, OND, HND or Cambridge moderated schools of basic studies  terminal examination or international Baccalaureates from recognised institution.
utme_requirements: The department requirement for B.ED four (4) years degree programme includes five (5) credits  ordinary level in English language, Mathematics and any other three (3) relevant subjects to the candidates option in Arts, Science, Social Science and Vocational in not more than two sittings at the WASC/SSCE/GCE/NECO or their equivalents.
subjects: English Language and other three subjects relevant to  the candidates option in Arts, Science, Social Science and Vocational

university_name: IGNATIUS AJURU UNIVERSITY OF EDUCATION PORT HARCOURT RIVERS STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
In addition to the O' Level requirements stipulated in UTME above, a candidate must have passed at credit level in at least two A' Level papers in the basic subjects required for the programme.

A candidate with ND in a relevant area such as Diploma in Industrial Relations and Personnel Management (IRPM), Diploma in Business Administration (DBA), Public Administration and or any other Diploma certificates with Upper Credit in addition to the requirements for UTME.

A candidate with HND in a relevant discipline with at least Upper Credit in addition to the requirements for UTME.

A candidate with a B.Sc./BA or any other first degree, with a minimum of a 3rd Class in addition to the requirements for UTME.

A candidate with the minimum score acceptable by the University in JUPEB, in addition to the requirements for UTME.
utme_requirements: A candidate must obtain at least a Credit level pass in five subjects at the O' Level/SSCE examinations of WAEC, NECO or any other body accepted by the University in not more than two sittings in subjects including Mathematics, English and any of the following: Economics, Commerce, Government/Civic Education, Financial Accounting and Marketing.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics or Commerce

university_name: IGNATIUS AJURU UNIVERSITY OF EDUCATION PORT HARCOURT RIVERS STATE
direct_entry_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Literature in English and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Literature in English, English Language and three other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English, one other Arts subject and another Arts or Social Science subject.

university_name: IGNATIUS AJURU UNIVERSITY OF EDUCATION PORT HARCOURT RIVERS STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
Direct Entry applicants should possess five credit passes in SSCE/WAEC/GCE, at least two of which at Advanced level in relevant subjects or equivalent examinations like NABTEB, JUPEB, IJMB etc. The subjects include: English Language, Mathematics, Economics or Commerce or Marketing or Entrepreneurship, and any other two from  Government, Accounts, Book-keeping, Office Practice, Marketing, Entrepreneurship, Store Management, Business method, Agricultural Sciences, Salesmanship, Christian Religious Knowledge, Geography, Short-hand, literature in English, Biology, Insurance, I C T, Data processing, Store Keeping, Book Keeping, Tourism, Stenography, Civic Education, etc.

 

ii)      ND, NCE etc in relevant disciplines with at least upper credit grade in addition to the five credit passes as stated in (i) above.

iii)     Final certificate of relevant professional bodies in addition to five credit passes as stated in (i) above.
utme_requirements:
(i)                Candidates should obtain in NOT MORE THAN TWO SITTINGS, a minimum of five relevant CREDITS passes in SSCE/NECO/GCE/’O’ LEVEL examinations or equivalent examinations. The relevant subjects shall include English Language, Mathematics, Economics or Commerce or Marketing or Entrepreneurship, and any two of the following subjects: Salesmanship, Government, Accounts, Book-keeping, Office Practice, Store Management, Business method/Studies, Agricultural Sciences, Christian Religious Knowledge, Geography, Short-hand, Literature in English, Biology, Chemistry, Insurance, ICT, Data processing, Store Keeping, Tourism, Civic Education, etc . Such candidate shall be admitted into year one of the degree programme in the department.

(ii)             Equivalent passes at ‘O’ level in other recognized examinations in Nigeria and elsewhere may be considered by the department, subject to approval by the University.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics or Commerce etc

university_name: IGNATIUS AJURU UNIVERSITY OF EDUCATION PORT HARCOURT RIVERS STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
(i)         Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Arts or Fine Arts and any other subject.

ND upper credit HND lower credit from recognised institutions.
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and Fine Arts.

For holders of NTC, the relevant subjects could be General Wood work, Building/Engineering Drawing, Introduction to Building Construction; Decorative Painting; Spray Painting, Lining, Sign and Design; Wall hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing; Printing Origination; Machine Printing and Finishing; General Metal Work, Basic Electricity, Spinning, Weaving, Surface Design and Printing; Bleaching, Dyeing and Finishing; Graphic Design; Graphic

Printing and Ceramics.
subjects: Fine Arts and two (2) other Arts subjects or Social Science subjects.

university_name: UNIVERSITY OF JOS JOS PLATEAU STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
1. Passes at the Advanced level in GCE, IJMB or an approved equivalent examination in two or three of Chemistry and Botany/Zoology. In addition, candidates must also meet the five (5) credit passes in WASCE/NECO/GCE/NABTEB requirements as in UTME.

2. Holders of the following qualifications from institutions recognized by the University of Jos may also be considered for admission into 200 level. Higher National Diploma (HND) in Agriculture, Forestry, Animal Health and Production and other relevant qualifications with at least an Upper Credit. Candidates must also meet the ‘O’ Level requirements for UTME.
utme_requirements:
Credit passes in five (5) WASSCE/GCE (‘O’ levels/NABTEB)

Subjects and its equivalent as approved by the University Senate, including English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry Biology or Agricultural Science and Physics. The credit pass in Agricultural Science must be backed up with at least a pass in Biology. In addition, candidates must have UTME scores high enough for the cut-off point set for the year in which the applications are being considered.
subjects:
Five SSCE Credit passes to include:

English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and any one of the following:

Physics, Geography or Economics

university_name: UNIVERSITY OF JOS JOS PLATEAU STATE

Candidates must also meet the ‘O’ Level requirements for UTME.
utme_requirements:
Five SSCE Credit passes to include:

English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and any one of the following:

Physics, Geography or Economics
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and any one of Physics or Mathematics.

i.      Minimum of five (5) O/Level credit passes    as specified in the UTME REQUIREMENTS.

ii.    Very good passes in three JUPEB subjects: Geography, Mathematics, and Physics.

iii.   Very good passes in three Advanced Level GCE subjects or its equivalence: Geography, Mathematics, and Physics or its equivalent.

iv.  Holders of OND in Meteorology with a minimum of Upper Credit into 200 Level.

v.    Holders of World Meteorological Organisation (WMO) recognized Class II Meteorological Diploma/ Junior Meteorological Technician Diploma into 200 Level

Holders of HND in Meteorology with a minimum of Upper Credit into 300 Level.
utme_requirements: Five O/Level credit passes in English Language,  Mathematics, Geography, Physics and any one subject from Chemistry, Biology, Agricultural Sciences, Further Mathematics, Computer Sciences/ Information Technology.
subjects: English Language, Geography, Mathematics and any one subject from Physics, Agricultural Science and Chemistry.

university_name: UNIVERSITY OF LAGOS LAGOS STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
(i) ND upper credit in Meteorology in addition to the 'O' Level requirements.  OR

(ii)WMO Class II Certificate in Weather Forecasting in     addition to the 'O' Level requirements.

(iii) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics and Physics in addition to the SSC requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including Physics, Mathematics and English Language and either Chemistry or Geography
subjects: Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry or Geography

(i)   IJMB: Ten (10) points and above in the IJMB Examinations to enter 200 Level, in addition to UTME requirements to include: Mathematics, English, Chemistry, Physics and Biology or Agricultural Science.

(ii)  NCE: At least a Merit to enter 200 Level,  in addition to UTME requirements to include: Mathematics, English, Chemistry, Physics and Biology or Agricultural Science.

(iii)  ND: At least Upper Credits to enter 200 Level  in addition to UTME requirements to include: Mathematics, English, Chemistry, Physics and Biology or Agricultural Science.

(iv)   HND: At least a Lower Credit to enter 200 Level  in addition to UTME requirements to include: Mathematics, English, Chemistry, Physics and Biology or Agricultural Science.
utme_requirements: Five (5)  credits passes  in  WAEC/ GCE / SSCE / NABTEB which should include: Mathematics, English, Chemistry, Physics and Biology or Agricultural Science.
subjects: English, Chemistry, Physics and Biology or Agriculture.

university_name: FEDERAL UNIVERSITY LAFIA NASARAWA STATE
direct_entry_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Biology, Chemistry and Physics in addition to the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics.

university_name: FEDERAL UNIVERSITY LAFIA NASARAWA STATE
direct_entry_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Arabic and any other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Arabic and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Arabic and two (2) subjects from Arts and/or Social Sciences.

university_name: FEDERAL UNIVERSITY LAFIA NASARAWA STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
(i)         Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Creative Art, Visual Art or Fine Art and any other subject.

(ii)     ND upper credit,  HND lower credit from recognized institutions.
utme_requirements:
(i)  English Language, Mathematics and any of the following; Fine Art, creative Art, Visual Art or Technical Drawing, plus any other two (2) subjects to make a total of five credits

For holders of NTC, the relevant subjects could be General Wood work, Building/Engineering Drawing, Introduction to Building Construction; Decorative Painting; Spray Painting, Lining, Sign and Design; Wall hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing; Printing Origination; Machine Printing and Finishing; General Metal Work, Basic Electricity, Spinning, Weaving, Surface Design and Printing; Bleaching, Dyeing and Finishing; Graphic Design; Graphic Printing and Ceramics.
subjects: Fine Arts and two (2) other Arts subjects or Social Science subjects.

university_name: UNIVERSITY OF ABUJA GWAGWALADA ABUJA FCT
direct_entry_requirements:
DIRECT ENTRY REQUIREMENT

Two (2) A Level Passes in Arts/Social Science Subjects from IJMB (10 points or above); Diploma in (Shari'ah and Common) Law with Upper Credit/credit  from a recognized institution; NCE/HND with a minimum of Merit, Lower Credit respectively from a recognized institution; or An acceptable first Degree from a recognized University
utme_requirements: Five SSCE O'LEVEL or its equivalent to include: English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, Islamic Studies/Arabic Language, Any other Arts/Social Science Subject. Evidence of basic knowledge of Arabic Language will be an added advantage
subjects:
UTME SUBJECT COMBINATIONS 

English Language; Islamic Studies/ Arabic Language; Any other Two (2) Arts/Social Science Subjects

university_name: ALEX EKWUEME FEDERAL UNIVERSITY NDUFU ALIKE EBONYI STATE
direct_entry_requirements: All candidates seeking admission by Direct Entry (DE) into the 200 Level must have Advanced Level or its approved equivalent with at least Credit level passes in at least two (2) social science subjects, one of which must be Government. Candidates with acceptable pass in JUBEB and Upper Credit in Ordinary National Diploma (OND) and Higher National Diploma (HND) from approved Polytechnic and Monotechnic Diploma-Awarding Institutions and/or their approved equivalent in the following disciplines: Peaceand Conflict Studies, Criminal Justice Administration, Paralegal Studies, Social Policy, Public Administration, Law, Security and Intelligence, and other related disciplines as well as First Degree in any discipline are also eligible for admission through DE, in addition to satisfying the O’Level minimum requirements. In addition, a minimum of 12 years of practical experience in related fields such as military, police and other State law enforcement agencies, in addition to satisfying the basic O’Level requirements, may be considered for admission into DE—the Officer must be in active service and not below the rank of Major or its equivalent.
utme_requirements: For admission into the four-year-degree programme in CRIMINOLOGY & SECURITY STUDIES, a candidate must have Senior Secondary School Certificate Examination (SSCE) or its equivalent with at least credit level passes in five (5) subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Government, and any other two subjects from: Geography, Economics, History, Civic Education, Financial Accounting, Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Christian Religious Knowledge, French, and Nigerian Languages (i.e. Hausa, Igbo or Yoruba) at not more than two sittings. The candidate must also earn an acceptable score in the Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME).
subjects: The required UTME subjects are English Language, Government, and any other two subjects from either of Life/Health Sciences, Behavioural/Social Sciences or Arts/Humanities background.

university_name: ALEX EKWUEME FEDERAL UNIVERSITY NDUFU ALIKE EBONYI STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
Candidates seeking Direct Entry admission into the 200level of the B.Sc. Economics degree program shall possess any of the following qualifications:

a.     GCE Advanced level passes in at least two subjects which must include Economics.

b.     Acceptable passes in JUPEB or its equivalent;

c.      National Diploma Upper Credit or its equivalent in a related field.

d.     Higher National Diploma (HND) Lower Credit in a related field.

e.     NCE credit or its equivalent in related field;

f.    First degree in a related area from a
utme_requirements: Credit Passes in English, Mathematics, Economics and any two relevant subjects from the following: Further mathematics, Government, Accounting, Geography, Lit. in English, Commerce, Book Keeping, Civic Education, History, CRK/IRK, any Nigerian Language/French, Physics, Chemistry
subjects: Use of English, Mathematics, Economics and any one of the Further Mathematics, Government, Accounting, Geography, Lit. in English, commerce, Book Keeping, Civic Education, History, CRK/IRK

university_name: ALEX EKWUEME FEDERAL UNIVERSITY NDUFU ALIKE EBONYI STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
Candidates for Direct Entry admission into three years degree programme in Educational Management will join the programme at 200 level. They would possess any of the following qualifications in addition to the basic university admission requirements of the subject area departments whose courses would be considered as restricted electives.

1.Two passes in relevant subject areas at advanced level, with SSCE/GCE “O” level credit pass in 5 subjects including English and Mathematics at not more than two sittings, OR

2. A two year diploma of a recognized institution in Nigeria or overseas with pass level not below merit.

3. At least a merit pass in two major subjects in relevant areas at NCE from recognized institution in Nigeria or overseas.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, and three other relevant subjects
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and one (1) other Social Science/Arts subject.

(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any of Biology, Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics.

 

(ii)  NCE merit in Physical Education and credit in Arithmetical process or Mathematics.

 

(iii)  Diploma in Health Education, Environmental Sanitation, Physical Education, Social work, Health Administration with overall grades of merit plus three (3) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit which should include English Language.

 

(iv) NCE in Biology, Health Education, and Integrated Science with a pass grade plus two (2) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit passes.

 

(v)    Registered Nurse plus five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language.
utme_requirements:
i) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes including     English Language, Biology or its equivalent.

 

ii) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes to include English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) relevant subjects.

(i)  ND with a minimum of upper credit or equivalent from recognized Polytechnics and Colleges of Wildlife Management in relevant programs (Agricultural Sciences).  Such candidates are also expected to meet the requirements for UTME admissions specified in   (a) above.

university_name: FEDERAL UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY OWERRI IMO STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
FUTO requires

i.     At least two A’ level passes not below Grade C in Chemistry and any one of Zoology, Botany, Agricultural Science, Biology, Mathematics, Physics and Economics.

ii     OND/HND at Credit in Life Sciences.

iii. First Degree in Life Sciences.

iv. Very good passes in three JUPEB subjects namely Chemistry ,   Biology/ Agricultural Science, Mathematics , Physics and Economics

Candidates must in addition meet the ‘O’ Level requirements.  FUTO does not accept NCE
utme_requirements: At least five O’ Level Credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and any other subject, in not more than two sittings.
subjects: Any three of Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science, Mathematics Physics and Economics

Colleges/institutions

Any one of the following qualifications is admissible for either of these options: In addition to SSCE requirements, applicants should possess at least two A’ Level papers in relevant subjects.

 *Three-Year Direct Entry:* 
Candidates to be admitted to the 300 level are expected to have completed their HND in Health Information Management and must have participated in the compulsory one-year NYSC programme. This programme is also called top-up in some universities in Nigeria.
 *Four-Year Direct Entry:* 
Candidates are to be admitted to the 200 level and must have completed Professional Diploma (PD) or National Diploma (ND) in Health Information Management at the Colleges of Health Sciences and Technology in Nigeria or its equivalent. In addition, candidates are expected to have the same entry requirements of credit in five (5) subjects (Mathematics, English, Biology, Physics, and Chemistry) at no more than two sittings.

Students can transfer into 200-Level courses provided they have the relevant qualifications. Universities are to satisfy themselves that the grades obtained by such candidates are acceptable.

university_name: BAMIDELE OLUMILUA UNIVERSITY OF EDU. SCIENCE AND TECH. IKERE EKITI EKITI STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
Any one of the following qualifications is admissible for the three (3) year B. A. Linguistics with specialization in Hausa, Igbo, Yoruba, or Arabic.

 1. Candidates seeking admission into a three-year Degree programme B. A. Linguistics with specialization in Hausa, Igbo, or Yoruba degree programme. Candidates seeking admission to study B. A. Linguistics/Hausa, by direct entry must possess advanced-level passes in Hausa which can be HAUL1 or HAUL2, and any other relevant art or social science subject. Also, for B. A. Linguistics/Igbo he/she must possess advanced level passes in Igbo which can be IgboL1 or IgboL2, and one other relevant art or social science subject. For B. A. Linguistics/Yoruba he/she must possess advanced level passes in Yoruba and one other relevant art or social science subject. In addition, the candidate MUST possess O’ Level credit passes in five (5) relevant subjects including English language and four other relevant art subjects at not more than two (2) sittings.

Waiver: Hausa will be waived for candidates wishing to major in Linguistics/Hausa.  Also, Igbo will be waived for candidates wishing to major in Linguistics/Igbo. For candidates wishing to major in Linguistics/Yoruba, Yoruba is compulsory. 

Candidates wishing to major in Linguistics/Arabic, Arabic or Islamic Studies is compulsory.   




 (ii) NCE at credit level in Hausa (for a candidate wishing to major in Linguistics / Hausa), Igbo (for a candidate wishing to major in Linguistics / Igbo), Yoruba (for a candidate wishing to major in Linguistics / Yoruba) or Arabic (for a candidate wishing to major in Linguistics /Arabic) and one other relevant subjects provided the O’ Level requirements are satisfied.

(iii). Diploma in Hausa, Igbo, Yoruba, or Arabic at lower credit pass provided the O’ Level requirements are satisfied.

2. NCE graduates of Hausa L2 or Igbo L2 programme with not less than a Merit pass in Hausa or Igbo and one other teaching subject are qualified to apply. Such a candidate is not required to have any pass in Hausa or Igbo at SSCE level but must have credit passes in English language, and four other relevant subjects at not more than two (2) sittings. For Yoruba, such a candidate must have credit passes in English language, Yoruba, and three other relevant subjects at not more than two (2) sittings.  Also, for Arabic, such candidates must have credit passes in English language, Arabic, and three other relevant subjects at not more than two (2) sittings.
utme_requirements:
UTME (4-Year Programme)

 The admission into the degree programme is through UTME. Students intending to study Linguistics Studies must fulfill the admission requirements of possessing five credit passes in the Senior Secondary School Certificate Examination or its equivalent in not more than two (2) sittings including English language and four other relevant art subjects. There is a waiver for candidates wishing to major in Linguistics with specialization in Hausa or Igbo, i.e. for candidates wishing to major in Linguistics/Hausa, Hausa is waived.  Also, Igbo will be waived for candidates wishing to major in Linguistics/Igbo. For candidates wishing to major in Yoruba, Yoruba is compulsory. In addition, candidates must have an acceptable score in the UTME.

For Linguistics/Arabic, the candidate should possess five credit passes in the Senior Secondary School Certificate Examination, National Board for Arabic and Islamic Studies (NBAIS) or its equivalent in not more than two (2) sittings including English language and Arabic language or Islamic Studies and three other relevant art subjects. A stipulated cut-off mark score in UTME is also included.
subjects: English Language and any Arts subjects such as Yoruba, Arabic, Government, History, CRK/IRK

Eligible candidates must possess one of the following qualifications:

1.     NCE at Credit or Merit level with O’level or SSCE or NECO or equivalent at credit level in at least five other subjects including English Language and Yoruba at not more than two sittings.

2.     Three passes at the Advanced Level with GCE O’level approved equivalent credit passes in two other subjects at not more than two sittings (passes at the Advanced Level may be obtained at the GCE A’level, HSC or IJMB, JUPEB. At least seven points in Interim Joint Matriculation Board (IJMB, A’level) and Joint Universities Preliminary Examinations Board (JUPEB) from recognized institutions.

3.     Diploma in Yoruba at Lower credit pass provided at O’level requirements are satisfied.

Inter-University Transfer Mode

Students can transfer into 200 level courses provided they have the relevant qualifications. Universities are to satisfy that the grades obtained by such candidates are acceptable.

university_name: DELTA STATE UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY OZORO DELTA STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
Candidates who fulfill the normal admission requirements and who have obtained G.C.E Advanced Level, HSC/IJMB or equivalent passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Geography or Economics may be admitted at the 200 Level of the programme.





Candidates who have obtained National Diploma (ND) in Building Technology or any related courses (with minimum of Lower Credit) or other approved equivalent qualifications by the Federal Ministry of Education and the University Senate may be admitted into 200 Level




Higher National Diploma (HND) at credit level from any recognized polytechnic shall be admitted into 300 Level

(i)          National Diploma (ND) with upper credit pass in the relevant field of study for admission into 200 level or Higher National Diploma (HND) in the relevant field for admission into 300 level.

,

(ii)         GCE ‘A’ Level   Passes in Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry in addition to ‘O’ level requirements.

(iii)        Candidates with JUPEB or IJMB at acceptable grade levels.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level credits to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, and any other Science subject.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

university_name: BOWEN UNIVERSITY IWO OSUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
(i) Minimum of three Advanced Level GCE/Cambridge/IJMB/JUPEB at Grade C pass in each of Biology, Chemistry, and Physics.


(ii) B.Sc. degree in relevant disciplines such as Biology, Zoology/Animal Science, Plant Science/Botany/Plant Biology, Microbiology, Anatomy, Physiology, Biochemistry, Chemistry, Physics, etc; as approved by Senate.

(iii) HND in relevant fields as approved by Senate.

(iv) Candidates must have completed the compulsory one-year National Youth Service (NYSC) or must have been issued an exemption/exclusion certificate
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level credits in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, and Biology at not more than two sittings.
subjects: English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Physics

(ii)         Candidates with B. Sc. Second Class Upper Division in a related discipline can apply for the MB;BS programme.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level credits in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, and Biology.
subjects: English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Physics

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
To qualify for entry into the 3-year programme for the award of a B.Sc. Degree in Accounting, a candidate must fulfil the following:

a. Possess Five O’ level credit passes at not more than two sittings including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects from the following: Geography, Biology, Commerce, Government, Account and Book-keeping at not more than two sittings.

b. Possess two A’ Level passes in relevant commercial courses acceptable to the University.

c. Possess Ordinary National Diploma Lower Credit in relevant courses including Accounting, Finance, Insurance, Banking and other Financial Studies courses.

d. Possess National Certificate of Education, Merit in relevant courses including Accounting, Finance, Insurance, Banking and other Financial Studies courses
utme_requirements: Possess Five O’ level credit passes at not more than two sittings including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects from the following: Geography, Biology, Commerce, Government, Account and Book-keeping at not more than two sittings.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other subject.

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements: Direct entry into 200 Level must have at least five ordinary level credits with a minimum of two relevant subjects at GCE/IJMB Advanced Level or any approved equivalents in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Good scores in UTME and must have the following minimum qualifications in SSCE or its equivalent with credit level passes in five subjects at not more than two sittings. These include; English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics. Candidates must have an acceptable score in Post UTME Screening.
subjects: U.T.M.E subjects are English language, Biology, Chemistry and Physics

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements: Candidates seeking admission by Direct Entry into 200 Level in B.Sc (Hons) Biology must have at least five (5) O’level credits in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics, and are also required to have passed a minimum of two (2) relevant subjects (which must include Biology) at JUPEB, GCE/IJMB Advanced level or any approved equivalents in relevant science subjects.
utme_requirements: Candidates should possess the following minimum qualifications: SSCE or its equivalents with credit level passes in five subjects at not more than two (2) sittings. These include English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics. Candidates must also earn an acceptable score in the post UTME screening.
subjects: U.T.M.E subjects are English language, Biology, Chemistry and Physics

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements: In addition to the ordinary level requirements, candidates for admission should possess Ordinary National Diploma from a recognized tertiary institution, with a minimum of 2nd Class Lower Division.
utme_requirements: Candidates seeking admission to the four year Degree programme should possess SSCE or their equivalents with at least five credit passes which must include English Language, Mathematics and Economics and pass at the University Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME).
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics and one other subject.

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements: Students with an Ordinary National Diploma from an accredited polytechnic or other equivalent institutions, will be considered for admission provided they graduated from the respective institutions with a minimum of Lower Credit grade (or its equivalent) in addition to fulfilling the O’ Level subject requirement listed above. Candidates with at least two passes in JUPEB/IJMB or its equivalent in relevant subjects may be considered for admission through direct entry into second year.
utme_requirements: The prospective candidates must have a minimum of five credits in Mathematics, English Language, Chemistry, Physics and any other relevant science subjects at the Ordinary level (O’ Levels) Senior Secondary School Certificate Examinations at not more than two sittings.
subjects: The UTME subject combination required for admission is English Language, Chemistry and any of Physics, Mathematics and Biology.

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements: Direct Entry—Candidates seeking admission by Direct Entry into 200 level Computer Science degree programme of the University must have at least five (5) O’level credits with a minimum of two (2) relevant subjects at Advance level of any approved equivalents
utme_requirements: UTME- for admission into Computer Science first degree programme of the University, candidates are required to possess at least credit level passes in five subjects including English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any of Biology/Agricultural Science/Economics/Geography in SSCE or its equivalents at not more than two (2) sittings. In addition, candidates must also earn an acceptable pass mark in the UTME and post UTME screening.
subjects: UTME SUBJECTS: The Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME) subjects are English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
Admission through Direct Entry is for a three year programme, starting at 200 level. The candidate must have five credit passes at WASCE or its equivalent in relevant subjects, including English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics, and any one of Economics/Geography, Biology/Agricultural Science, at not more than two sittings. In addition, candidates must have A-Level passes in two relevant subjects from Mathematics and  Physics or Chemistry. Candidates with appropriate ND/OND/HND or NCE passes in relevant courses may also be considered for admission.

Holders of HND at minimum of Lower Credit in Computer Science are eligible for consideration for admission into 300 level.
utme_requirements: Admission through the UTME is for a four year programme. The candidate must have five credit passes at WASCE or its equivalent in relevant subjects including English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics, and any one of Economics/Geography, Biology/Agricultural Science, at not more than two sittings. In addition, candidates must have the required acceptable score at the Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME).
subjects: The UTME subject must be English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry/any science subject.

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
To be considered for admission into the 3-year degree programme, candidates must have passed, at credit level, five subjects including English Language, Economics and Mathematics and other two relevant subjects in either Arts or Social Sciences at the Senior Secondary School Certificates/GCE Ordinary Level or its equivalent in addition to two A Level passes or JUPEB or its equivalents in relevant subjects including Economics.

(Note: Commerce is not one of the subjects accepted in the Department of Economics).
utme_requirements: Candidates must have obtained credit passes in five subjects at a sitting or five subjects at not more than two sittings at ‘O’ Level/Senior Secondary Certificate (WAEC, NECO etc.) Examinations.  The credits must include English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects in Arts or Social Sciences.
subjects: Candidates must take at the UTME, English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other Arts or Social Sciences subjects.

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements: In addition to the above stated “O” level subjects, ONLY candidates who possess JUPEBIJMB result or Diploma in English language-related courses result are considered for admission. Such Diploma MUST be with minimum of Lower Credit. A candidate who has successfully gone through the JUPEB Foundation programme in two relevant Arts and Social Science subjects is also qualified to be considered for admission.
utme_requirements: It is required that candidates must possess 5 O’ Level Credits at not more than two (2) sittings including English Language, Literature-in-English and any other three subjects in arts or social sciences.
subjects: Candidates must take at the Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examinations [UTME], English Language, Literature in English and any other two subjects from the Social Sciences and the Arts.

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
Possess Five O’ level credit passes at not more than two sittings including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects from the following: Geography, Biology, Commerce, Government, Account and Book-keeping at not more than two sittings.

b. Possess three A’ Level passes in TWO relevant commercial courses acceptable to the University.

c. Possess Ordinary National Diploma Lower Credit in relevant courses including Accounting, Finance, Insurance, Banking and other Financial Studies courses.

d. Possess National Certificate of Education, Merit in relevant courses including Accounting, Finance, Insurance, Banking and other Financial Studies courses.
utme_requirements: Possess Five O’ level credit passes at not more than two sittings including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects from the following: Geography, Biology, Commerce, Government, Account and Book-keeping at not more than two sittings.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics, and any other subjects.

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
Candidate for Direct Entry must have good passes at the GCE A/L, ND, NCE or their equivalents provided he/she meets the minimum entry requirements. In addition, the candidate for direct entry admission must submit a portfolio containing samples of his/her works to the Head of the Department of Fine & Applied Arts at the time he/she is returning the application forms to the Admissions office.           

Holders of HND at minimum of Lower Credit in Fine and Applied Arts are eligible for consideration for admission into 300 level.
utme_requirements: English Language, Mathematics and Any other three subjects from Arts, Science or Commercial.
subjects: English Language and  Any three (3) Arts, Science, or Social Sciences subjects.

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
Direct Entry candidates must fulfil the O’level requirement above and have a minimum of Lower Credit at the ND Examination or equivalent from a recognized institution or G.C.E (Advanced Level) or equivalent in at least two science subjects including Biology or Agricultural Science to qualify for admission into 200 level of the programme.

Holders of HND at minimum of Lower Credit in relevant discipline are eligible for consideration for admission into 300 level.
utme_requirements: Candidates must have five credits in O’ level or SSCE or NECO at not more than two sittings to include credit pass in Mathematics, English, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and Physics           .
subjects: English language, Chemistry, Physics or Mathematics and Biology/Agricultural Science

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements: Direct Entry candidates must fulfil the O’level requirement above and have a minimum of Lower Credit at the ND Examination or equivalent from a recognized institution or G.C.E (Advanced Level) or equivalent in at least two science subjects including Biology or Agricultural Science to qualify for admission into 200 level of the programme.
utme_requirements: Candidates must have five credits in O’ level or SSCE or NECO at not more than two sittings to include credit pass in Mathematics, English, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and Physics           .
subjects: English language, Chemistry, Physics and any other ONE of Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
Direct Entry candidates must fulfil the conditions in O’ Level requirements and have a minimum of Lower Credit at the ND Examination or equivalent from a recognized institution or G.C.E (Advanced Level) or equivalent in at least two science subjects including Physics and Chemistry to qualify for admission into 200 level of the programme.

 

Holders of HND at minimum of Lower Credit in relevant discipline are eligible for consideration for admission into 300 level.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other Science subject.
subjects: The University Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME) subject requirements include: English language, Physics, Chemistry and Biology/ any Science subject.

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements: Direct Entry candidates must fulfil the conditions in 1 (above) and have a minimum of Lower Credit at the ND Examination or equivalent from a recognized institution or G.C.E (Advanced Level) or equivalent from a recognized institution or G.C.E (Advanced Level) or equivalent in at least two science subjects including Physics and Mathematics to qualify for admission into 200 level of the programme.
utme_requirements: Candidates must have five credits in O’level at not more than two sittings to include: English, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, and any one of Further Mathematics/Biology/Agricultural Science.
subjects: Candidates must have the following combinations in UTME: English language, Physics, Mathematics and any one of Chemistry/Further Mathematics/Biology/Agricultural Science.

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
Students with an Ordinary National Diploma from an accredited polytechnic or other equivalent institutions, will be considered for admission provided they graduated from the respective institutions with a minimum of Lower Credit grade (or its equivalent) in addition to fulfilling the O’ Level subject requirement listed above. Candidates with Advanced Level results with at least a credit (Grade C) in Chemistry in addition to pass in two others subjects including Mathematics and/or Physics or any Biological or Agricultural Science subjects may be considered for admission through direct entry into second year.

Holders of HND at minimum of Lower Credit in relevant discipline are eligible for consideration for admission into 300 level.
utme_requirements: The prospective candidates must have a minimum of five credits in Mathematics, English Language, Chemistry, Physics and any other relevant science subjects at the Ordinary level (O’ Levels) Senior Secondary School Certificate Examinations
subjects: Chemistry, Mathematics and any of Physics/Biology/ Agricultural Science.

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements: In addition to the ordinary level requirements above, candidates for admission should possess Ordinary National Diploma from a recognised tertiary institution, with a minimum of 2nd Class Lower Division in relevant programmes.
utme_requirements: Candidates must have obtained Five (5) Credit passes at not more than two sitting in five (5) subjects including English Language, Mathematics and Economics at SSCE, NECO and GCE Ordinary Level.
subjects: Candidates are expected to take English Language, Economics and two (2) other subjects at the UTME.

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements:

utme_requirements: Candidates must have obtained Five (5) Credit passes at not more than two sitting in five (5) subjects including English Language, Mathematics and Economics at SSCE, NECO and GCE Ordinary Level.

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements: TWO JUPEB passes or A Level in relevant subjects, National Diploma in Journalism, Mass Communication or Media Studies (with at least Lower Credit) from recognized universities, and NCE (English Language combination) with Lower Credit.
utme_requirements: Candidates must have obtained five credit passes at one sitting or five credits passes at two sittings at the ‘O’ Level/Senior Secondary Certificate (WAEC; NECO etc.). Such credits must include English Language, Literature in English and Mathematics and two other relevant subjects.
subjects: Subjects include: English, Literature-in-English and any other two subjects from social sciences, sciences and Arts.

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements: Direct Entry: In addition to the ‘O’ level requirements, as stated above, candidate must possess two A – Level passes in Mathematics and at least one of Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Economics or Geography. Equivalently, candidate should possess good NCE certificate with Mathematics and any one of the Sciences written above as teaching subjects. NCE candidates are expected to pass at distinction or credit level. OND candidates with at least distinction or upper credit are qualified for admission. Candidates with JUPEB Certificate are also eligible.
utme_requirements: UTME ENTRY: Candidates for admission into the B.Sc. (Hons) degree in Mathematics must possess 5 (five) O – level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Further Mathematics, Physics and any of Chemistry or Biology or Economics or Geography.
subjects: UTME SUBJECTS: The unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME) subjects are English, Mathematics, Physics and any one of Chemistry or Economics or Geography.

direct_entry_requirements: Candidates seeking admission by Direct Entry into 200 Level in B.Sc (Hons) Microbiology must have at least five (5) O’level, credit passes in English language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics, and are also required to have passed a minimum of two (2) relevant subjects (including Biology) at JUPEB, GCE/IJMB Advanced level or any approved equivalents in relevant science subjects.

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
Two A Level passes including Music.

Candidates with the following qualifications are eligible to apply for admission into 2nd year of the Music Programme:

-           Joint University Provisional Examination Board (JUPEB) - Music

-           OND from a recognized institution with a minimum of Upper Credit

-           NCE (Music Major) not less than Merit

 

Candidates with minimum of Grade 7 Certificate from any of the following bodies: Associated Board of Royal School of Music (ABRSM), Mountain Top International Music School (MIMS), Musical Society of Nigeria (MUSON) or Trinity College of Music (TCM) may also be considered.
utme_requirements: Candidates must have at least five (5) credits at the SSCE (or its equivalents) in English Language and any other four subjects chosen from Social Sciences, Arts and Natural Sciences at not more than two sittings. While a Credit pass in Music at SSCE level is not mandatory it is desirable. A minimum of a Grade 5 Certificate of the Associated Board of Royal School of Music (ABRSM), Mountain Top International Music School (MIMS), Musical Society of Nigeria (MUSON) or Trinity College of Music (TCM) will be considered as an equivalent of an SSCE Music credit pass.
subjects: English Language, and any other three subjects

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
Five credits in General Certificate of Education, Ordinary Level and NECO at least two of which must be a GCE Advanced Level including Christian Religious Knowledge as in UTME above; and then,

 A pass in two principal subjects at the NCE Level/ A/L, or JUPEB and/or the equivalent plus five subjects at credit level in GCE O/L, SSCE, NECO, and TC II are acceptable in MTU

A Three-Year Diploma in any Theological Seminary or College recognized by the University plus five credits at the GCE ‘O’ Level including English Language and CRK.

Eligible holders of Mountain Top Bible College Diploma could be admitted for a two-year programme leading to the award of B.A Degree in Mountain Top University’s Religious Studies.
utme_requirements: Five (5) Credit level passes in the SSCE/NECO/GCE (O/L) to include English Language, and CRK/BK/, and any other three subjects among the following: Government/Civic Education, Literature in English, Economics/Commerce, Music, Fine Arts.
subjects: JAMB/UTME SUBJECTS: Candidates are required to register and pass English Language, and any other three of the following: CRS, Government/Civic Education, Literature in English, Economics/Commerce, etc. including any from natural sciences.

university_name: MOUNTAIN TOP UNIVERSITY MAKOGI OBA OGUN STATE
direct_entry_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Accounting, Economics, Management, Mathematics, Geography and Statistics.




To qualify for entry into the 3-year programme for the award of a B.Sc. Degree in Securities and Investments, a candidate must fulfil the following:

a. Possess Five O’ level credit passes at not more than two sittings including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects from the following: Geography, Biology, Commerce, Government, Account and Book-keeping at not more than two sittings.

b. Possess two A’ Level passes in  the relevant commercial courses acceptable to the University such as Economics, Geography and Government.

c. Possess Ordinary National Diploma Lower Credit in relevant courses including Accounting, Finance, Insurance, Banking and other Financial Studies courses.

 

d. Possess National Certificate of Education, Merit in relevant courses including Accounting, Finance, Insurance, Banking and other Financial Studies courses.

 

e. Holders of HND at minimum of lower credit in relevant discipline are eligible for consideration for admission into 300 level.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include: English Language, Mathematics and any other subjects. For NBC, the other two (2) relevant subjects could be from any of the following; Accounting, Principles of Accounts, Commerce, Office Practice and Economics.
subjects: Candidates are expected to take English Language, Mathematics, and any other two subjects.

direct_entry_requirements: For four-year Direct Entry, in addition to five (5) Senior School Certificate (SSC) credit passes which must include  English  Language,  Mathematics,  Physics, and  Chemistry, candidates with at least two passes in relevant subjects  (Mathematics,  Physics  and Chemistry) at the GCE Advanced Level or IJMB or JUPEB may be considered for admission. Candidates with good National Diploma (ND) results in relevant Engineering Technology programmes may also be considered for admission into 200 level. Holders of upper credit pass and above at Higher National Diploma (HND) level, are eligible for consideration for admission into 300 level.
utme_requirements: For the five-year degree propgramme, in addition to acceptable passes in the Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME), the minimum admission requirement is credit level passes in Senior School Certificate Examination (SSCE) in at least five subjects, which must include English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and other acceptable science subjects at not more than two sittings.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, and other acceptable science subjects at not more than two sittings.
